products.title: Columbia Men's Fairbanks Omniheat Winter Boots - Black - Black
products.priceLongMessage: Columbia Men's Fairbanks Omniheat Winter Boots - Black - Great Deal. Selection & availability may vary by location, order must be completed by November 12, 2020 1:59 AM ET to qualify.
products.longDescription: Comfort and waterproof warmth in a multi-sport boot for everyday winter adventures. The men’s Fairbanks Omni-Heat boot keeps your toes toasty with a combination of lightweight insulation and a thermal-heat-reflective lining, while a waterproof-breathable, seam sealed bootie construction keeps out snow, slush, mud, and rain.
products.features:
• Upper: Omni-Heat™ reflective lining. 200g insulation. Rated -25F/-32C. Cordura textile. Omni-Tech™ waterproof breathable seam-sealed membrane bootie construction.
  • Midsole: Techlite™ lightweight midsole for long lasting comfort, superior cushioning, and high energy return.
  • Outsole: Omni-Grip™ non-marking traction rubber.

products.title: The North Face Men's Ballard Boots - Camel Brown - Wheat
products.priceLongMessage: The North Face Men's Ballard 6″ Boot - Camel Brown - $90 Off Our Regular Price of $189.99. Selection & availability may vary by location, order must be completed by November 12, 2020 1:59 AM ET to qualify.
products.longDescription: With the protection of a work boot, and the style of jaguar, this sleek new winter warrior delivers both of best worlds. Waterproof leather upper pairs with ample (200g) PrimaLoft® Eco insulation to keep feet warm and dry in trying conditions. Grippy rubber outsole bites into slick, icy surfaces for stable, secure footing. Felt cuff.
products.features:
• Upper: Waterproof, full-grain leather upper
  • Bottom: Blown rubber sidewall and perimeter lugs reduce outsole weight
  • HydroSeal® waterproof membrane
  • 200 g PrimaLoft® Eco insulation
  • Combination felted wool and 50% recycled polyester lining
  • Durable, rustproof lace hardware
  • Gusseted tongue
  • Compression-molded, 30% recycled EVA Northotic™ footbed with partially recycled Poron® inserts for enhanced comfort
  • Inset, durable TNF Winter Grip® rubber outsole with IcePick® temperature-sensitive lugs

products.title: Salomon Men's X Reveal Chukka CSWP Winter Boots - Blue
products.longDescription: Drawing on our trail expertise, we decided to build a really versatile winter boot that looks great in the city. When the cold, rain and snow start to set in, you’ll stay warm, comfy and dry with the X-REVEAL CHUKKA CSWP.
products.features:
• Warm comfort: We've prioritized your comfort with warm materials, a soft collar and cozy faux-fur lining
  • Winter essentials: With a winter Contagrip® outsole that stays grippy in cold temperatures and a waterproof membrane, you’ll be ready for any weather
  • Versatile style: Equipping you for the great outdoors, this versatile shoe also looks and feels at home in the city
  • ClimaSalomon™ Waterproof: A flexible, lightweight, full waterproof bootie to ensure complete weather protection
  • Insulated membrane: A membrane with an additional layer of material like fur or foam, providing good insulation for active consumers
  • Contagrip® W: For all winter applications, Contagrip® W uses a unique compound that maintains adhesion in freezing temperatures. Lug patterns depend on usage

products.title: Timberland Men's Chillberg Premium Winter Boots - Black - Black
products.longDescription: Taking a wintertime hike or just trudging through snow while shoveling off the car requires rugged, waterproof, insulated boots. Timberland’s Chillberg men’s boots are designed to log hours outdoors in rough, cold conditions, while keeping your feet warm and dry.
products.features:
• Premium full-grain waterproof leather
  • Leather is from a tannery rated Silver by the Leather Working Group for its water, energy and waste management practices
  • Waterproof membrane keeps feet dry in any weather
  • 400 grams of PrimaLoft® insulation
  • 100% PET fleece lining is made entirely from recycled plastic bottles
